translations: v．产生影响，回报：对某人或某事产生积极或负面的影响。
· His efforts redounded to the benefit of the entire community.
他的努力使整个社区受益。

sentences.sentence: Hiss success redounded honour upon him.
sentences.translation: 他的成功给他带来了荣誉。

sentences.sentence: Every value he created ultimately redounded to his boss.
sentences.translation: 他创造的价值最后全进了他老板的腰包。

sentences.sentence: Every value they created ultimately redounded to his boss.
sentences.translation: 他们创造的价值最后全进了他们老板的腰包。
